Package algonquin.cst2355.finalprojectandroid

Class Conversion

java.lang.Object
algonquin.cst2355.finalprojectandroid.Conversion
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class Conversion extends Object implements android.os.Parcelable
The Conversion class represents a conversion object that holds information related to a currency conversion. It implements the Parcelable interface to allow easy transfer of objects between components.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Conversion

      public Conversion(String conversionAmount, String timeSemt, String convertedDetails, String currencyFrom, String currencyTo)
      Constructs a new Conversion object with the given conversion amount, time sent, converted details, currency from, and currency to.
      Parameters:
      conversionAmount - The amount to be converted.
      timeSemt - The time when the conversion was sent.
      convertedDetails - The details of the currency conversion.
      currencyFrom - The source currency of the conversion.
      currencyTo - The target currency of the conversion.
